name: Viva La Cerda
description:
Escape the restaurant and save your pig friends! Hide from the employees and collect enough piggies to escape before time runs out. 

WASD to move.

Space to jab and bump tables.

Collect pigs to move to the next level. 

This game is the third prototype from Dapper Rabbit Games. Currently, there are only four levels, but if there is interest we will expand the demo into a full game.
